The video was shared on Facebook on Janu: 2020, and shows military thermal imagery of a missile strike on a convoy.
The caption of the Facebook post claims: 3. A reverse image search using keyframes from the video revealed that the footage is actually from a military simulation video game called AC-130 Gunship Simulator: Special Ops Squadron.
Soleimani was killed by a US drone strik: Iraq, not in Iran as claimed in the misleading Facebook post.
